content:
Have resolved all sushi errors - but don't have permission to write to the repo. :(
still need the location of the 'original' primary care profiles so can compare outputs...
also need the correct dependancy for au base...
Why is there emptyReason in Allergy List? I thought we were'nt supporting that...
Your invite is still pending. Visit https://github.com/aehrc/primary-care-data-technical and check?

OK - seen that and uploaded. Note that this just fixes the sushi compiler issues - I created a new folder structure with the changes to support the template IG (didn't want to hack the original too much!). Will send the repo link through when I create it...
Maybe do it on a branch rather than a new repo?
Too late! I created a whole new folder on my machine :(. Perhaps I walk you through what I've done, and we can decide the best way to incorporate it...
BTW - do you know how to set the dependency to the published ai-base? the 'current' allergyIntolerance is missing some of the slicing...
@Brett Esler It sounds like a bunch of the things we had thought were in for R2 now aren't. I'll go through and update the labels on the github tickets
I had a catchup with Kate and Heather this morning - have a list which I think is the confirmed scope.
I added Goals earlier today, but I'll comment them back out
